name: Sand Young Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: The Sand Young Dragon is a large, stealthy creature with a neutral evil alignment, known for its agility in sandy environments and potent physical attacks.
memorable: It has a devastating breath weapon and the ability to inflict disadvantage on its foes.
goals: To ambush and overpower its enemies, leveraging its agile and stealthy nature.
relations: Similar to other dragons, it may encounter or conflict with other elemental creatures.
environment: Typically found in desert regions or sandy terrains.
strengths: Immune to fire damage and resistant to piercing damage, with strong physical attributes.
weaknesses: Requires only half the sustenance of a typical dragon, which can be a limitation.
attacks: Multiattack with a Bite that deals piercing damage and Claws that deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapon, capable of dealing both piercing and fire damage in a devastating cone.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and darkvision up to 120 feet.
skills: Has a keen perception with a passive score of 21, making it difficult to surprise.
additional_information: Has the Sand Camouflage ability for stealth in sandy areas.
Can inflict exhaustion with its Sand Blast breath attack.
Its Stinging Sand ability can debilitate targets on melee hits.
Combines agile movement with potent combat abilities.
Possesses a high armor class for added resilience.
test_queries: stealthy large dragon in sandy environments
dragon that inflicts disadvantage with sand attack
agile dragon that ambushes its foes
